source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FCTREFASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FX_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_FUND_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLALLOCATE_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLPRODUCT_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

SELECT TOP 1 [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'ADJ_MNL_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, RUNNING_STATE FROM (
SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, 1 AS RUNNING_STATE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_RUN_STATUS] = 'RUNNING'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'ADJ_MNL_%'
UNION
SELECT 'NO FILE' AS ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, 0 AS RUNNING_STATE
)x
ORDER BY RUNNING_STATE DESC;

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'BGT%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
